title: LFi Accessibility
creator: Little Forest
description:
Do you need to ensure that your web pages are compliant with Web Accessibility best practices?
We can help. Our LFi Accessibility tool gives you instant reports on how your pages perform against all major standards including WCAG 1.0, 2.0, Section 508 and many more.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
<abbr title="Web Content Accessibility Guidelines">WCAG</abbr> 1.0 — <abbr title="World Wide Web Consortium">W3C</abbr> Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0
<abbr lang="fr" title="Référentiel Général d’Accessibilité pour les Administrations">RGAA</abbr>, French government standard
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
